verses.roman:
aṣṭame--rāmacandra-purīra āgamana
tāṅra bhaye kailā prabhu bhikṣā saṅkocana

synonyms: aṣṭame—in the Eighth Chapter; rāmacandra-purīra āgamana—the arrival of Rāmacandra Purī; tāṅra bhaye—because of fear of him; kailā—did; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhikṣā saṅkocana—minimizing His eating.
translation: The Eighth Chapter describes the arrival of Rāmacandra Purī and how Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu minimized His eating due to fear of him.
